<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update client logo"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/oidc/clients/{id}/logo"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Upload or update the logo for an OIDC client

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Client ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"file":{"description":"Logo image file (PNG, JPG, or SVG, max 2MB)","type":"string","format":"binary"}},"required":["file"]}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"No Content"},"400":{"description":"Bad request or invalid file","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"Forbidden","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"404":{"description":"Client not found","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"413":{"description":"File too large (max 2MB)","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
